name: getComponentMetadata
description: Gets metadata (such as the functions and implemented interfaces of a component) for a CFC or ColdFusion interface.

params.name: path
params.description: The dot-delimited path of the interface or CFC definition.

examples.title: Display metadata for the web root Application.cfc
examples.description: This code returns a struct representation of the Application.cfc file in the web root.
examples.result: A struct with keys related to the CFC's metadata
